text: Matthew Chee Hung Tong or Matt Tong (born 29 April 1979), is a British musician. He played drums for the rock band Bloc Party, until his departure in 2013 and has been the drummer for Algiers since 2015. He was born in Bournemouth in England, United Kingdom but his parents were originally from England and Malaysia. In 2006, he married Brooke Vermilion, Kindness' old touring DJ. Matt tong drummed on the Rina Sawayama track “Frankenstein.” Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Bloc Party Category:English drummers Category:People from Bournemouth
title: Matt Tong
